newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela bolivar ends firmer at 470.00/471.00/dlr.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela bolivar ends firmer at 470.00/471.00/dlr.

text.p: The Venezuelan bolivar ended firmer at 470.00/471.00 per dollar as investors sold dollars for bolivars in order to participate in the local share offering of telephone company CANTV, traders said.
The unit closed at 470.75/471.75 per dollar on Wednesday.
"The market was awash with dollars and it seems to me that's because people are buying bolivars to buy into CANTV," said one broker.
Traders added Central Bank dollar sales had been only modest.
The offering of CANTV shares earmarked for small local investors closes Friday. Venezuelan institutional investors will be able to place orders through next week.
